column5: Enjoy this bright, spacious, fully furnished apartment in the heart of midtown Houston. Conveniently located on a quiet, tree-lined street, walking distance to top-rated bars and restaurants and the midtown MetroRail stop. Less than a 10 min drive to the Museum & Theater Districts, Houston sport/event venues, Medical Center & downtown Houston. The apartment complex includes 24/7 security, a controlled/gated parking garage, two pristine swimming pools and a gym.
column8: Home Sweet Home in Heart of Midtown Houston
